properties.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are complete.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathComplete

properties.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are complete.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathCompleteHover

properties.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathCurrent

properties.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathCurrentHover

properties.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathIncomplete

properties.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathIncompleteHover

properties.comment: The background color for the final stage of a Salespath when it has been lost.
properties.name: colorBackgroundPathLost

properties.comment: The background color for Salespath guidance coaching section.
properties.name: colorBackgroundGuidance

properties.comment: Used as a separator between dark colors like the stages of salespath.
properties.name: colorBorderPathDivider

properties.comment: Line heights for salespath
properties.name: lineHeightSalespath

properties.comment: Height of Salespath
properties.name: heightSalesPath

properties.comment: Action footer menu. Phone 44px; Tablet 50px
properties.name: heightFooter

properties.comment: Brand header. Phone 44px; Tablet 50px
properties.name: heightHeader

properties.comment: Input and button height
properties.name: heightInput

properties.comment: Space above overflow menu before scrolling.
properties.name: heightOverflowStart

properties.comment: Maximum height for action overflow menu so that it's not full-screen for tablet initially.
properties.name: maxHeightActionOverflowMenu

properties.comment: Maximum height for photos and such in cards.
properties.name: maxHeightCardMedia

properties.comment: Maximum height for brand logos in header.
properties.name: maxHeightHeaderBrand

properties.comment: Maximum width for action icons in action bar.
properties.name: maxWidthActionBar

properties.comment: Max-width of an action bar item
properties.name: maxWidthActionBarItem

properties.comment: Maximum width for action icons in action bar when there are only 2 items with labels.
properties.name: maxWidthActionBarWithLabels

properties.comment: Maximum width for action overflow menu so that it's not full-screen for tablet.
properties.name: maxWidthActionOverflowMenu

properties.comment: Maximum width for brand logos in header.
properties.name: maxWidthHeaderBrand

properties.comment: Use squareIconLargeBoundary
properties.name: squareRecordAnchorPic

properties.comment: Tap target Size
properties.name: squareTappable
